section.title: Installing Resource Adapters
section.para: Two options are available for installing Resource Adapters (RAs) that are compatible with Mobicents Diameter:

For new users, it is recommended that you install the Base RA from the binary. If you are an advanced user, who is comfortable with building from source, you can choose to build the RA from source code.

formalpara.title: Install From The Binary
formalpara.para: The binary package is available from the Mobicents Diameter SourceForge page (http://sourceforge.net/projects/mobicents/files/Mobicents%20Diameter/)

section.para: Select the Resource Adapter file that you want to install from the list, and download the archive.
